languages.text: {n}Ваше сердце преисполняется тревогой и гневом. Тысячи и тысячи молитв слыхали вы {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}за время службы в Экклезиархии{/d}, однако то, что сейчас произносит незнакомец — отнюдь не слова священного писания.{/n}

{n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше сердце преисполняется тревогой и гневом. Тысячи и тысячи молитв слыхали вы {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}за время службы в Экклезиархии{/d}, однако то, что сейчас произносит незнакомец — отнюдь не слова священного писания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy, and what this stranger is saying is far from the words of any holy text that you know.{/n}

{n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

{n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

{n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの心は不安と怒りで満ちている。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}長年にわたり帝国聖教会の一員として{/d}何千もの祈りを聞いてきたが、この見知らぬ者が言っていることは、あなたが知っているどの聖典ともかけ離れていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの心は不安と怒りで満ちている。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}長年にわたり帝国聖教会の一員として{/d}何千もの祈りを聞いてきたが、この見知らぬ者が言っていることは、あなたが知っているどの聖典ともかけ離れていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous êtes mal à l'aise et votre cœur gonfle de colère. Vous avez entendu des milliers de prières au cours de vos {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}nombreuses années au sein de l'Ecclésiarchie{/d}, mais les paroles de cet homme n'ont rien à voir avec les textes sacrés qui vous sont familiers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous êtes mal à l'aise et votre cœur gonfle de colère. Vous avez entendu des milliers de prières au cours de vos nombreuses années au sein de l'Ecclésiarchie, mais les paroles de cet homme n'ont rien à voir avec les textes sacrés qui vous sont familiers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的心中充满了不安和愤怒。身为{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}国教的神职人员{/d}，这么多年来你听过各种各样的祈祷。然而，这个陌生人说出来的话，与你所知的任何圣典都大相径庭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的心中充满了不安和愤怒。身为国教成员，这么多年来你听过各种各样的祈祷。然而，这个陌生人说出来的话，与你所知的任何圣典都大相径庭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu corazón se llena de inquietud y rabia. Has escuchado miles y miles de oraciones a lo largo de tus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}muchos años de servicio como miembro de la Eclesiarquía{/d}, pero lo que dice este desconocido dista sobremanera de cualquier texto sagrado que conozcas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu corazón se llena de inquietud y rabia. Has escuchado miles y miles de oraciones a lo largo de tus muchos años de servicio como miembro de la Eclesiarquía, pero lo que dice este desconocido dista sobremanera de cualquier texto sagrado que conozcas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Herz füllt sich mit Unbehagen und Zorn. Du hast in deinen {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}vielen Jahren als Mitglied der Ekklesiarchie{/d} tausende und abertausende von Gebeten gehört, und was dieser Fremdling da spricht, hat nichts mit irgendeinem heiligen Text gemein, den du kennst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Herz füllt sich mit Unbehagen und Zorn. Du hast in deinen vielen Jahren als Mitglied der Ekklesiarchie tausende und abertausende von Gebeten gehört, und was dieser Fremdling da spricht, hat nichts mit irgendeinem heiligen Text gemein, den du kennst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalbini bir öfke ve tedirginlik bulutu kaplıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Ekleşiarşi mensubu olarak hizmet ettiğin onca senede{/d} envaiçeşit dua işittin, yabancının ağzından dökülenlerse bildiğin hiçbir kutsal metne benzemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart fills with unease and anger. You have heard thousands upon thousands of prayers over your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}many years of service as a member of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, and what this stranger is saying is a far cry from any holy text you know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalbini bir öfke ve tedirginlik bulutu kaplıyor. Ekleşiarşi mensubu olarak hizmet ettiğin onca senede envaiçeşit dua işittin, yabancının ağzından dökülenlerse bildiğin hiçbir kutsal metne benzemiyor.{/n}
